name: music-player-sync-firebase
description: An audio player to synchronize audio with many devices
author: mxjoly <maxime.joly2808@gmail.com>

scripts.install: yarn-or-npm run install:app && yarn-or-npm run install:func
scripts.deploy:hosting: yarn-or-npm run build:app && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: yarn-or-npm run build:func && firebase deploy --only functions
